trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Define a identidade do usuário para um aplicativo ASP.NET, quando a autenticação do Windows está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, the WindowsAuthenticationModule sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, os conjuntos de WindowsAuthenticationModule o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto que representa a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS para a solicitação atual.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the WindowsAuthenticationModule uses the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o IIS usa a autenticação anônima, o WindowsAuthenticationModule usa a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O WindowsAuthenticationModule expõe um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento que permite que você forneça um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto para a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> de personalizado</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento é acessado, especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the WindowsAuthenticationModule class with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No IIS 7.0, usando a classe WindowsAuthenticationModule com o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>não há suporte para a classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre problemas de compatibilidade no modo integrado, consulte [mover um aplicativo ASP.NET do IIS 6.0 para o IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET chama este construtor para criar uma instância da <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o construtor, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>método para inicializar o novo <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>objeto.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o aplicativo autentica a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação é gerado durante o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can access the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o evento autenticar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto fornecido para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows a identidade fornecida pelo IIS é usada como a identidade da solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação anônima, o IIS usa o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>está definida como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** é gerado somente quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is not raised when both the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No IIS 7.0 em execução no modo integrado, o evento de autenticação do <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>não será gerado quando o ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>e o IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` módulos estão habilitados.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: Neste cenário, para receber uma notificação de autenticação, assinar o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>instância.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre problemas de compatibilidade no modo integrado, consulte [mover um aplicativo ASP.NET do IIS 6.0 para o IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos, que não seja a memória usada pelo <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O método Init garante que o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>está incluído no processamento do <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> instância.
